welcomePage.Set goals and actually conquer them: Set goals and actually conquer them
welcomePage.description: The key to achieving your goals is to break them down into bite-sized action steps. Want to make $5k/month… what products or services are you going to offer? Want 1000 Instagram followers… how are you going to connect with them? Start with your yearly goals and then break them down into quarters, months, weeks, and days, all with checklists to keep you on track.

RSS.Free course from The Rolling Scopes comm: Free course from The Rolling Scopes community.
RSS.The course is intended for RS School 202: The course is intended for RS School 2021Q3 students who have passed RS School stage #2, as well as for new students who have knowledge and practical experience in using the following technologies and tools
